subject: Soccer
African Cup of Nations (Soccer)
Civil War and Guerrilla Warfare
lead_paragraph: Togo performed a U-turn Saturday on its decision to quit the African Nations Cup, electing instead to stay in Angola and compete, a player said hours before the competition was to begin Sunday.
snippet: Togo performed a U-turn Saturday on its decision to quit the African Nations Cup, electing instead to stay in Angola and compete, a player said hours before the competition was to begin Sunday.
